item.title: Formal Notice sent to Assistant District Attorney Juan C. Rodriguez Jr, Manhattan District Attorney’s Office
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-04_1637_0800_email_to_rodriguez_manhattan_da_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: 18 U.S. Code § 4 - FORMAL NOTICE: DO NOT IGNORE Date sent: March 04, 2024, 16:37 +0800 (China Standard Time), March 04, 2024, 03:37 -0500 (Eastern Standard Time) To: Juan C. Rodriguez Jr, Esq. (Assistant District Attorney · Manhattan District Attorney’s Office) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-04_1637_0800_email_to_rodriguez_manhattan_da_Redacted.pdf Dear Mr. Rodriguez, Please be advised that this communication constitutes a formal notice under 18 U.
